Transparency and integrity from police department across the nation is not too much to ask The American public watched in horror a an officer kneeled on George Floyds neck pinning him to the ground while he repeatedly pleaded for his life 25

This egregious behavior can no longer be tolerated We demand accountability and transparency from all US police department The GeorgeFloyd LETIA incentivizes state and police department to do just that 35

The GeorgeFloyd LETIA make seven concrete step toward improving law enforcement management and misconduct prosecution tool I Law Enforcement Accreditation II Law Enforcement Development Programs III Administrative Due Process Procedures 45
